name: SZS
description:
Simple top-down zombie shooter made for fun on Construct 2.

Enemies get faster and spawn more frequently the higher score you have. My high score is 135

This is my very first game so  don't expect a lot :p

This game is a prototype, which means it may or may not be continued, fixed, updated, or expanded. It is just an idea so far

Disclaimer: Most of the textures in this game are not made by me and i downloaded them as game assets. More info in .txt file i put for download.
